short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Works in conjunction with the No-Password.com service to provide a no-fuss, single sign-on experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The No-Password service allows users to securely get to their webapps with no fuss.  If you are working from home or your workplace, you don't even need a password to securely access our service. Just get online.

No-Password.com manages your passwords and even rotates them every month for even better security.
